SDG_GOAL: Goal 10: Reduce inequality within and among countries
SDG_TARGET: Target 10.6: Ensure enhanced representation and voice for developing countries in decision-making in global international economic and financial institutions in order to deliver more effective, credible, accountable and legitimate institutions
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 10.6.1: Proportion of members and voting rights of developing countries in international organizations
STAT_CONC_DEF: The proportion of members and voting rights of developing countries in international organizations has two components, the developing country proportion of voting rights and the developing country proportion of membership in international organisations. In some institutions these two components are identical.
SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Goal 10: Reduce inequality within and among countries
SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: Target 10.6: Ensure enhanced representation and voice for developing countries in decision-making in global international economic and financial institutions in order to deliver more effective, credible, accountable and legitimate institutions
SDG_INDICATOR__GLOBAL: Indicator 10.6.1: Proportion of members and voting rights of developing countries in international organizations

fr.SDG_GOAL: Objectif 10 : Réduire les inégalités dans les pays et d’un pays à l’autre
fr.SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Objectif 10 : Réduire les inégalités dans les pays et d’un pays à l’autre
